internal.content:
--- title: Lab7 --- export const Title = () => ( Lab 7 - Service Mapping
); ; ## Lab Overview In Lab 7, you will change the name of the Ratings Service from rs-ratings to rs-ratings-your last name. By the end of the lab, you should be able to find your service in your Application Perspective with its new name. ## Step 1: SSH into your host. ``` sshubuntu@ ``` ## Step 2: Navigate to the robot-shop/ratings directory ``` cd /home/ubuntu/robot-shop/ratings ``` ## Step 3: Copy the file Docker file to Dockerfile.orig ``` sudo cp Dockerfile Dockerfile.orig ``` ## Step 4: Edit the file Dockerfile ``` sudo vi Dockerfile ``` And add the following line: ``` ENV INSTANA_SERVICE_NAME=rs-ratings- ``` ## Step 5: Navigate back up to the robot-shop directory. ``` cd /home/ubuntu/robot-shop/ ``` ## Step 6: Execute: docker-compose build ratings ``` sudo docker-compose build ratings ``` ## Step 7: Execute: docker-compose up -d ratings ``` sudo docker-compose up -d ratings ``` ## Step 8: In the UI, find your service in your Application Perspective and verify the new name. Click Application, then Services, and lastly verify the name. ![Lab 7](images/lab7.1.png)

MdxNode.rawBody:
--- title: Lab7 --- export const Title = () => ( Lab 7 - Service Mapping
); ; ## Lab Overview In Lab 7, you will change the name of the Ratings Service from rs-ratings to rs-ratings-your last name. By the end of the lab, you should be able to find your service in your Application Perspective with its new name. ## Step 1: SSH into your host. ``` sshubuntu@ ``` ## Step 2: Navigate to the robot-shop/ratings directory ``` cd /home/ubuntu/robot-shop/ratings ``` ## Step 3: Copy the file Docker file to Dockerfile.orig ``` sudo cp Dockerfile Dockerfile.orig ``` ## Step 4: Edit the file Dockerfile ``` sudo vi Dockerfile ``` And add the following line: ``` ENV INSTANA_SERVICE_NAME=rs-ratings- ``` ## Step 5: Navigate back up to the robot-shop directory. ``` cd /home/ubuntu/robot-shop/ ``` ## Step 6: Execute: docker-compose build ratings ``` sudo docker-compose build ratings ``` ## Step 7: Execute: docker-compose up -d ratings ``` sudo docker-compose up -d ratings ``` ## Step 8: In the UI, find your service in your Application Perspective and verify the new name. Click Application, then Services, and lastly verify the name. ![Lab 7](images/lab7.1.png)
